website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking chandelier that provides a lot of light for small areas, although the installation may provide some problems.
pros: Looks a lot more expensive than it really is
A lot of illumination for smaller rooms and closets
Install with a medallion for added elegance
cons: Comes with a plug end instead of bare wire, which can make installation more complicated

customer_reviews.title: Pretty piece
customer_reviews.text: So pretty, just for the record it is not glass, it's acrylic, but I don't mind, it still looks pretty and the beading gives it a nice touch. I went with some other reviewers choice to add the ceiling crown piece to give it that extra pretty factor.
customer_reviews.author: Cadensd79

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a baby's room
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is beautiful. My husband installed it easily, although the threading seemed a bit too long since we cut off all the chain and had it as close to the ceiling as possible but we figured out how to cover it. I'm really happy with this purchase and more happy with the price. We added a 10 inch ceiling medallion to finish off the look. I'd recommend this chandelier!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chandelier! I bought it for my daughters nursery. Like people said, it has a plug but you can cut that off and hardwire to to a light switch. This was easy and did not require an electrician. The chandelier came with lightbulbs but they are not LED lightbulbs so we will be replacing them. The chain is super long and we ended up not needing any of the length due to the ceiling heigh of our room, but there is definitely a lot of length if you need it! I think the brightness is prefect and we are going to put it on a dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: RJW

customer_reviews.title: Get a medallion and buy bulbs
customer_reviews.text: It had a cheap bead look to it, I didn't read the description well enough and thought it more metal and crystal. Also doesn't include bulbs and you have to modify it if you want to hang it from the ceiling. The screws included were to small to mount it as well. That being said it looks cute and I managed to install with no experience. I definitely think the medallion suggestion is one to take, it makes it much grander.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chandelier for our shabby chic guest room. It's perfect! Jim wired it directly, which took about 30 minutes. He even likes it. We purchased the ceiling decor piece too. It's plastic and once it's put with the chandelier you can't really notice. We have the chandelier on a dimmer switch, which I wish I had dimmed for the photo. Plenty of light for this guest room but we will put a bedside lamp for guests to use, but it's not needed for additional light. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Super cute chandelier, the crystals are plastic but you can't tell once it's hanging up plus it helps bring the cost down. I paired mine with a 20 inch medallion for a little more "wow" factor and the chandelier doesn't look underwhelming next to it. Great buy on a budget!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Initially when I inboxed this I was a little disappointed but we kept going forward with installation. It has this weird crystal rhinestone stuff on some of the arms. I didn’t get it. However, when we got it installed In our nursery you can’t even see it, it’s so beautiful and I love it!! Can’t wait for my baby girl to be here so she can enjoy it too!! I will also mention that the threaded. I poke it comes with is extremely short and was too short for the wall medallion we initially ordered. We had to get a smaller less fancy one. But overall, still happy!
customer_reviews.author: The Beltran’s

customer_reviews.title: Looks good once it's up. Tricky install if powering from electric box overhead
customer_reviews.text: As far as the finished product, it looks awesome. With high efficiency LED bulbs there is plenty of light. Only issue -- fishing the power wire through the center tube to get up into the box, what a pain. You have to hold up the whole assembly while fishing it in since you should have cut the wire short enough that you're not going to shove feet worth of wire into the electric box. Even with that part of the install being tough, still the overall product earns five stars for looking good and working as designed. My kiddo loves it (yes it's in a bedroom, LOL)
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to install, all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my eleven year old and a year later, she still loves it! The four bulb is good for a regular sized bedroom. it would be beautiful in a nursery, too. I recommend getting a ceiling medallion to put up with it so it looks polished. My friend's daughter, who is almost 13, ordered the black for her room because she loved it so much. Great purchase, fast shipping, good value, and packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: CoastLife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a normal sized room and well made
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mom's sewing room. It's a small room with 8 foot ceilings and this light fit perfectly....has presence and pizzaz without overpowering the room or knocking you in the head when you get near it. It creates bright light to see well when crafting (used warm LED bulbs). It's well made b not cheap looking like some non-crystal chandeliers can be. My mom LOVES it and I'm very happy I found it online for her after several months of searching for a light that was dinky, or too big for the space. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Using it as a Tree Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to see this when it gets dark, but I couldn't wait and my husband hung it as soon as it arrived. This little chandelier is perfect for what I want. We already have string lights in our tree, so we just attached it to one of the ends. My husband came up with a system that will make the chandelier super easy to put up and take down as the weather dictates. (I know it's not weather resistant.) And, most importantly, my granddaughter will love it!
customer_reviews.author: JustMeInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cheap foam packing that makes a huge mess just by opening package!
customer_reviews.text: This light is pretty, but I mistakenly didn't pay attention to the fact that it is not Prime - so I'll be paying the 10.00 fee to ship it back because I don't like it enough to keep it. It looks a little cheap. Company needs to research modern packaging materials......
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Elegancy in my Master Bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my chandelier! Very elegant at an affordable price. Never thought I would have such a beautiful chandelier in my room for the price I paid. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: NaNi

customer_reviews.title: THIS LIGHT PLUGS IN, not hard wired!
customer_reviews.text: Wellp. Nowhere in the description of this product does it mention that it's not a hard-wire fixture. It plugs in. It costs $300 to have an electrician install an outlet for it, and god knows if it's even safe to try to convert it. I'm so disappointed, and I'll never know if it works in my daughter's room because we can't use it like this :(
customer_reviews.author: Rob Wendorf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little light!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as the light fixture for our baby’s nursery. It’s not super bright, but it’s really cute! It would also make a great light for a walk in closet or dressing room. It was fairly easy to install using the hardwire option. We also purchased the decorative plate piece that goes at the ceiling with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to instal
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cuteeee and I loved the price but we had 2 problems: - My husband is an electrician and he had a very hard time to install it. The canopy that holds the chandelier to the ceiling box os not a standard style. It is not designed by an electrician that is for sure. - I have amazon prime but the delivery was late and took couple extra days :(.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option for a glamorous look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my closet. It's not quite as heavy as I expected it to be but that turned out well because it would have been harder to install. Installation was not easy - a couple hour job for a novice and you definitely need two people to install. It's the perfect size for a small space. Be aware that the crystals are plastic. Lightbulbs are super easy to find at any hardware store. It definitely provides a lot of light - perfect for my walk in closet.
customer_reviews.author: JLynn

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH BETTER THAN EXPECTED! It is adorable! I have a shabby chic theme in my room and it is perfect for it. I got the Etekcity Wireless Remote Control Electrical Outlet Switch for Household Appliances with it. They are perfect together I used the hot glue gun and glued it next to the light switch on the wall (the remote control). AHHHHH thank you for such a cute product!
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is in my daughters nursery and is just stunning. I get so many compliments on it! Great for the price, I wanted a Victorian-esk theme and this worked perfectly. The lights are great also, not too bright but not too dim either, and my daughter loves looking at the pattern the lights create on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea c.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but a pain to install.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to piss your husband off then buy this...mine was cursing the whole time trying to install it. It’s a pain but WORTH IT😍 It’s beautiful once it’s installed.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our nursery. Easy as heck to install (we plugged in and hung from ceiling) and looks great hanging up. I was worried it would be junky or look cheap and that is NOT the case. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Anne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: OMG the cutest little girl’s chandelier ever! We are building a new house and it just got hung yesterday. There have been 3 different families walk through the house and ALL 3 have girls who now want the same light. I’m sending the amazon link to all 3 moms to buy it right after I’m done with this review. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jennie scott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm SOOO disappointed in this chandelier. It is absolutely beautiful in our daughters room. First, it is difficult to install. The lack of instructions make it very difficult and required us to get a professional to install. Secondly, after only 4 months of having it installed it is no longer working :( I am emailing the manufacturer and will change my review if they resolve my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anibal

customer_reviews.title: which is a nice addition. The bulbs give off a soft light ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for in my baby girl's nursery. 4 lightbulbs are included, which is a nice addition. The bulbs give off a soft light and we installed it on a dimmer switch. It comes equipped to plug into the wall, but you can strip the cord and hard wire it with some knowledge of the process. It was a bit trickier than anticipated, but overall pretty easy. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Van Cott

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: So much prettier than I expected it to be! It is absolutely perfect for our baby girl's nursery. The room is on the smaller side but the chandelier is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this light in the nursery, it’s exactly what I wanted: Very classy and elegant for a girl’s room.
customer_reviews.author: karenamanda

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I did this as a plug in lamp. Was already all put together, just added the lights, hung it and viola...gorgeous chandelier that glimmers like crazy. Is actually prettier than one I paid twice as more for
customer_reviews.author: Erika D. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: So thrilled! Beautiful for the price, perfect size over my tub, this made my whole room
customer_reviews.author: Chante

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This little light is adorable and totally perfect for my she shed
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Williams

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my granddaughters Birthday and she loved it very much . perfect
customer_reviews.author: cheryl Aho

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this but I live in apartment so I made my own set up I put plastic anchors and longer sharp point screws and bent the the mount to make room for plug wire . I did all by myself so it's just finding solution to what ur preferences are
customer_reviews.author: Rf

customer_reviews.title: Love this light with a few adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bright chandelier. I used night light bulbs as the nice candle light bulbs are 25 watt each and there are 4 of them. I was looking for more of a mood or candle light feel so the night light bulbs worked perfect. I used it in our guest bedroom with a french shabby chic look and it worked really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conwell

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I added a cord cover, dimmer extension cord, ceiling medallion and a custom “scrunchie” to fill in the space. I could sit and admire it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: LKA

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough chandelier. The fact that it looks like some bedazzled it makes it have a...younger look than what's in the picture. Came with the light bulbs which was unexpected. Only bad part was how it was packaged. Retrieving it from its styrofoam mummification was an epic PITA and made a huge mess. Get bubble wrap or something.
customer_reviews.author: Eztli

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable and lovely
customer_reviews.text: It is lovely. It was a little tricky to hang because the wires have to be fed through the turning bolt. Tightening the screw to the ceiling pulled apart the connections the first time. Black electric tape and less movement the second time helped keep the wires connected. I love it. I like that it is acrylic rather than glass too, so it was already put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. i swapped the cheap bulbs for LED and this looks great
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Just like picture.
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as pictured. So adorable. Perfect size for my bedroom. The 4 bulbs are plenty bright enough. I will be installing a dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cute in my daughters room. I took other reviewers advice and added a medallion. Once hung, the overall look is very elegant. Hardwired installation requires cutting wires and rerouting them through the end of the fixture. Basic understanding of positive/ negative/ground wire is necessary, as the instructions do not detail how to convert the light from a lamp to a hardwired fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. This is in the nursery and it is perfect. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: beachwife

customer_reviews.title: Just gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This Chandelier did not disappoint.It is high quality and beautiful. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Perfect for a girls room.
customer_reviews.text: I had to hire someone to install. I personally do not try to do anything electrical myself, so I don’t know how hard it is to install. I love the way it looks, it’s exactly as I hoped for. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect finishing touch
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It was the perfect addition to a baby’s room that we just decorated!! Great price point in comparison to others as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michele T

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet light, you can plug it in or install ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet light, you can plug it in or install like a normal chandelier. I recommend getting a medallion as well. We have this in my daughter's room and it's adorable. Fairly easy to install, no different than any other light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: E. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't utilize it for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know it wasn't code to put this in our closet due to the exposed bulbs. Now we're kind of just sitting on it not sure what to do with it...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice! Have placed it into my daughters walk in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice! Have placed it into my daughters walk in and it just gives it that extra she was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: forallweknow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! Bought this for daughter’s room and she loves it! It’s very dainty and girly.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Even more beautiful in person!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this chandelier! We bought it for the baby’s nursery and it is soooo cute. The pictures don’t do it justice. I am considering one for the master bedroom now too! It comes fully assembled unlike a lot of them I found online which made installing it much wasier. I didn’t use the lights provided, instead we bought LED lights and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is heavy and looks like it is made pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Just received this...it is heavy and looks like it is made pretty good, but it is lacking that elegant look and kinda looks (for lack of a better word) --tacky. I may remove some of the crystals and use it still. It is the right size for a nursery though.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Nursery Lighting
customer_reviews.text: We hung this in our daughters nursery for a touch of glam! It is exactly what I had envisioned. My husband was able to install it without help and it works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Kelci

customer_reviews.title: Very girly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our bathroom remodel, we are going with a vintage look and clawfoot tub so I wanted a cute chic chandelier to tie it all together. I LOVE IT. It is perfect size. The only problem is that it is VERY girly, almost childish in a way. A few of the crystals are shaped like flowers, you cannot really tell from far away but up close it looks very childish. I am obviously being very picky over the flower crystal shape, it just is different. Other than that I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Darr

customer_reviews.title: Cute light for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! We installed this in our daughter's nursery and we get lots of compliments on it. I worried at first that it would be too low on our 8-foot ceilings, but it worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the new nursery. When my husband hung it up it was absolutely beautiful! The room is nice and bright and it is so classy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Deana C Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and elegant
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition to a small craft room. It doesn't put out a ton of light, but it's just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Missing lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice but was missing the lightbulbs that were supposed to be included?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Weber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a girl’s room.
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift and the guest of honor was surprised to receive this from me. Even more surprised when the light was installed and how beautiful it truly is. It sparkles. Perfect for their princess when she arrives in four weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning! Perfect bedroom chandelier! Rich looking and adds that certain extra something for that finishing touch! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Farrington

customer_reviews.title: Got this in white and love it -- it looks much more expensive that you'd ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this in white and love it -- it looks much more expensive that you'd think, and was very easy to set up. Everything is plastic but unless you touched it, you'd actually never know. Love!
customer_reviews.author: chocolate convert

customer_reviews.title: Great little chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our little girls room and it's just perfect. Very feminine! Adds a touch of elegance to her bedroom and makes her feel like a little princess! We love it. Great quality, very sparkly and lights are not too bright. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Wife: Not at all like the picture. Super cheap looking and tiny. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: This chandelier is perfect for our nursery
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is perfect for our nursery! The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it didn't clearly state it was plug in. Thankfully my husband is handy and could hardwire it himself but otherwise we would have needed an electrician!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Princess Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My sister recently came to live with us. She works from home, and we decided to make her workspace an area fit for a queen! Perfect light by which to work, beautiful in appearance. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jette

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is adorable. I use it as a display piece in a retail store and have had so many people want to buy it and disapointed that its not for sale! I did only receive 3 bulbs instead of 4 so I had to go out and buy all new bulbs since I couldn't find a single bulb locally that looked like the others. Easy fix and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Huston

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, not to big but not to small and it comes with light bulbs!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality, but it is what you paid
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this fixture was a bit lacking, but for $80, it is really nice! I paid 1.5 times the amount for a nearly identical one, and the quality difference is noticeable and notable. I returned it, but I bet it could work well for someone
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute chandelier. We use it in our daughter's playroom!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M Long

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this light! It is the perfect balance of dainty and classic. Is doesn't look plastic at all!! Lightweight and simple installation. Had it up in 5min. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momster

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous for a nursery!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier is absolutely gorgeous in our little princess' nursery!!! We originally ordered the 3 bulb, which was way too small for a standard sized room. We had looked in multiple stores for a period of time and online. We found this to be by far the best for the price!! Even looking to spend more, we couldn't find any that weren't over the top for a nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little chandelier... I'd give 5 stars, but the canopy that meets the ceiling is too small to hide the electrical box in the ceiling. We had to by a medallion from Lowe's to make it look good. My 8 yr old loves it and I'm going to order one for her 5 yr old sister's room, too.
customer_reviews.author: Goridegirlnc

customer_reviews.title: Love this, perfect for my nursery
customer_reviews.text: Love this, perfect for my nursery. It's not too big and it's not too small. The reason I'm giving it 4/5 and not 5/5 is because the plastic "crystals" were pretty scratched up and don't look as elegant as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Krimmel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Put it in my daughters room. Gives off a lot of light
customer_reviews.author: KAC10

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, gives off great amount of light!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter's bedroom. It looks beautiful and gives off a lot of light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a baby girl’s nursery!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful addition to my first grandchild’s nursery. We have a baby girl due on April 1st!!!!!! So excited to see her in her beautiful room!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Detra D. Croll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby chandelier ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product and was so inexpensive! So so in love with it. Our baby girl’s room is now exquisite! She keeps staring at it and smiles.
customer_reviews.author: TKJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Super subtle! But just the perfect touch for a small nursery!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my girls nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chandelier! It's just so perfect and dainty for my girls nursery. It was really easy to put up. It took me and my husband less than an hour to put up and that's including taking the fan down.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: No bulbs but super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute chandelier but did not come with bulbs like it says in picture #3 !??? My daughter and I are bummed but overall happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my bathroom. Was packaged well and looks elegant. I recommend the piece for around the top.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my daughter's nursery. Great size and color. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sibel

customer_reviews.title: Great Chandelier!
customer_reviews.text: Seems very nice and sturdy. I was able to remove the plug and direct connect it to the wires in my daughters room without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This gorgeous dainty chandelier looks amazing in my bathroom with the medallion I ordered for it~ It's a bit of Paris in my room! You won't be sorry!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This light is so perfect for my girls room. It has plenty of light and it is so perfect. We don’t have high ceilings, but we adjusted it and it looks great! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jaren Stanton

customer_reviews.title: This chandelier looks great and is perfect for my daughters room
customer_reviews.text: This chandelier looks great and is perfect for my daughters room. The only problem is that this product is such a pain to install.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for my daughter's bedroom. They are perfect! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lara E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty chandelier for daughter's room.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this as part of a room decoration project. It's really a standout design item.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful and looks like you spent a million dollars! I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & perfect for over an end table or smaller room
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for Price
customer_reviews.text: This small chandelier looks very classy and fits well in a 10'x12' child's room. My only complaints are 1) it doesn't come with swag hooks, only the mounting bracket that attaches to the ceiling box, so unless you're going to wire it you have to buy swag hooks. 2) the light bulbs get extremely hot very quickly, and put off a lot of heat, which concerns me.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in my baby's nursery!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this chandelier! It looks lovely in my babies nursery and will be able to grow with her as her room changes. Its beautiful and dainty. <3
customer_reviews.author: millerhn

customer_reviews.title: No light bulbs included
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful chandelier. It said in the description that it came with 4 light bulbs. However, I did not receive any light bulbs with my chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful touch to my shabby chic room.
customer_reviews.text: Just made my shabby chic room. Beautiful and reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet T

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Arrived perfectly and were a great touch in our girls' rooms. I was concerned they would not put out enough light but they do great by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: SBoecker

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Used in daughters room and she loves it. Works great and were happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Boe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Have this is my master bedroom. It gives just the right amount of light and is just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Melton

customer_reviews.title: I put it in my daughters nursery and it is beautiful! It looks classy and expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute chandelier! I put it in my daughters nursery and it is beautiful! It looks classy and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to a nursery
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Bought for nursery and love the glamorous touch. Seems nice quality considering the reasonable price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Cute. I didn't read the information carefully, though ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I didn't read the information carefully, though. This is a swag light that plugs in. I had to have it re-wired to make it work where I planned.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice chandelier
customer_reviews.text: It's not just for a girl's room. I put this in one of my guest rooms with a Victorian 16" ceiling medallion rosette from Westinghouse (77028). The combination worked perfectly. I've gotten many compliments and I am very happy. Both were easy to install. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Oseroff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my Day Spa!
customer_reviews.text: These lights look absolutely gorgeous in my new spa! Amazing price, elegant and sophisticated, just perfect for the space, and super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Perry

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Truly pretty and perfect size for our 150sq ft baby nursery. It does not look cheap at all. Go ahead and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Polanco

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken. Pictures make it look nicer than it ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Pictures make it look nicer than it really is.
customer_reviews.author: MFender

product_meta.title: Tadpoles 4-Bulb Vintage Plug-In or Hardwired Mini-Chandelier, White Diamond
product_meta.description:
Color:White Diamond| Size:4 BulbElegant vintage-inspired 4 bulb white chandelier. This beautiful chandelier features a metal frame accented with faceted acrylic beads and dangles. Use in any room of your home to add a glamorous feminine touch of light. Uses four 25-watt candelabra bulbs (NOT INCLUDED). Hang either with cord and plug as swag, or professionally install with included chain and ceiling cover plate. UL listed & certified.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A beautiful 4 bulb chandelier is the perfect finishing touch to any room - even the powder room. This lovely vintage-style metal framed chandelier has glass and acrylic beads and dangles, and uses four 25 watt candelabra bulbs.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 14" x 14" x 17" inches Chandelier. Large enough to make a statement, small enough to be delicate and not overwhelm the room.
CORD LENGTH: Hanging chain 12 feet and plug-in cord 15 feet; 2 ceiling plates (diameter 4.7 inch) and hardware are included.
BULB SIZE: Uses four 25Watt E12 candelabra bulbs works great with both incandescent or led chandelier light bulbs
USE: Perfect for nursery, baby’s room, girl's room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, dining room, even a hallway or closet. Maximum Wattage (watts):100.
ASSEMBLY: Not required. INSTALLATION: hang either with cord and plug as a swag lamp, or hardwire install as a ceiling fixture (professional installation recommended). ul listed, ul certified.
